name: Quaint Strawberry Uprising
description:
A generic top down shooter where you play a strawberry trying to take over the world. It is my first project, and I'd be glad for any feedback.

Move with WASD, shoot with Left Mouse Button.

This is completely untested for Mac/ Linux. I have a windows pc and it works on that.

Thanks to:

Jess - for helping me come up with the idea

Ben - for putting up with me talking about it for months.
